entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

entry.title: Children of Morta
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$6.99 â†’ $2.99 [$2.99 ~ $6.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$2.99

Application Description

*Online co-op is now available: play with a friend by sharing a code!* Children of Morta is a story-driven action RPG with a roguelite approach to character development, in which you donâ€™t play a single character but a whole, extraordinary family of heroes. Hackâ€™nâ€™slash through hordes of enemies in procedurally generated dungeons, caves and lands and lead the Bergson family, with all their flaws and virtues, against the forthcoming Corruption. The story takes place in a distant land but copes with themes and emotions common to all of us: love and hope, longing and uncertainty, ultimately loss... and sacrifice we are willing to make to save the ones we care the most for. Ultimately, it's about a family of heroes standing together against the encroaching darkness. -- Complete Edition -- Both the Ancient Spirits and the Paws and Claws DLC are included in the main game and available as you play. FEATURES - Welcome to the family! Join the heroic Bergsons in their trials to honor their heritage and save the land of Rea from the creeping Corruption - One for all, all for one: improve skills and gear for the whole family through each run in the ever-changing world of this roguelite RPG - Stronger together: switch between 7 playable characters, each with their own abilities, fighting styles and endearing personality - Immerse yourself in the beautiful, deadly world of Rea through gorgeous 2D pixel art mixing handcrafted animations with modern lighting techniques - Family that slays together stays together: use the two-player online coop mode and rely on each other in every fight (available in a post-launch update) CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE - Revamped interface â€“ exclusive mobile UI with complete touch control - Game Center achievements - Cloud Save â€“ Share your progress between iOS devices - Compatible with MFi controllers - iPhone 15 Optimization (including Pro Max)

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Skul: The Hero Slayer
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$7.99 â†’ $2.99 [$2.99 ~ $7.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$2.99

Application Description

Skul is a fast-paced action rogue-lite where losing your head is encouraged. Featuring 100 playable characters each with their own unique abilities and a ton of items that can create wild synergies, the battles are as electrifying as they are challenging. The Demon King's Castle in Ruins The human race attacking the Demon King's castle is nothing new and has happened countless times before. What makes this time different though, is that the Adventurers decided to join forces with the Imperial Army and the 'Hero of Caerleon' to lead a full onslaught in hopes of wiping out the Demons once and for all. They attacked the Demon stronghold with overwhelming numbers and succeeded in its total destruction. All of the demons in the castle were taken prisoner except for one lone skeleton named 'Skul'. Dark Mirror Mode Once you're through with the main story, test your skills and limits in the new challenging 'Dark Mirror' mode! FEATURES -Youâ€™re the last hope of the entire demon race! Play as Skul, a tiny skeleton on a path to slay the pompous heroes and save the demon king from the corrupt army of Carleon. -Losing your head never felt so right: try on new skulls to borrow the powers and dashing outfits of their previous owners and create synergies with unique items to defeat your enemies. -What is dead may never die: you will not rest until you have faced all the challenges of this action-packed rogue-lite platformer. -Let your hollow eyes feast upon vibrant, cartoony pixel-art 2D animations as you help all sorts of demonic creatures return to their original state. -From the Mummies of Egypt to the Minotaur of Greece or even an official Dead Cells crossoverâ€¦ Will you spot all the fun easter eggs scattered across the game? CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE - Revamped interface â€“ exclusive mobile UI with complete touch control - Game Center achievements - Cloud Save â€“ Share your progress between iOS devices - Compatible with MFi controllers - iPhone 15 Optimization (including Pro Max)

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Evoland
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$2.99 â†’ $0.99 [$0.59 ~ $2.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$0.99

Application Description

Evoland is an action adventure game that takes you on a journey through the history of classic adventure and RPG gaming. As you progress through the game, you unlock new technologies, gameplay systems and ever-improving graphics. From monochrome to full 3D graphics and from turn-based battles to real-time boss fights, Evoland makes you live the evolution of adventure gaming â€“ all with plenty of humour and nods to moments from classic games. - Play through the history of action-adventure video games - Discover many evolutions, from old school 2D action/adventure to active time battles and full 3D action - Revisit the starting area rendered in full 3D or explore the overworld with your own airship! - And have fun with the dungeons, puzzles, a heap of secrets to uncover, and hundreds of achievements and stars to collect Check out the official website at evoland.shirogames.com Follow us on Twitter @playdigious Like us on Facebook /playdigious If you experience any problem with Evoland, please contact our customer support team at playdigious@gmail.com. Don't forget to specify which device and operating system you are using. Supported languages: English, German, Spanish, French, Chinese, Korean, Japanese

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Image Eraser - Inpaint & heal
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Gold VIPï¼š$3.99 â†’ $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $3.99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$0.99

In-App Purchases

  • Gold VIPï¼š$0.99
  • Remove adsï¼š$0.00

Application Description

Do you want to remove unwanted items from your photos? Then this app is for you. With Image Eraser, you can remove undesirable objects from your images, such as power lines, people, logos, watermarks, text or any other undesired artifacts as easy as taking a shot itself. Image Eraser uses advanced algorithms to actually fill in the background with appropriate textures for that area. It has brought the magic of intelligent fill to the iPhone! Features: - Delete unwanted people from photo - Erasing wires and power lines - Erase wrinkles and skin blemishes - Repair old photos - Remove moving objects from photo - Remove watermarks, data stamps and much more unwanted objects - Easy to get use & started Also take a look at these other free apps in the App Store: â€¢ Photo Cut Out Editor - The easiest way to cut out and composite photos. â€¢ Color Recolor Effects - Change color of everything. â€¢ Photo Focus Effects - Get you highlighted and dramatical by simply selecting focus area. â€¢ Face Story - Morph face and make movie. Give us a review is appreciated. This will help and encourage us to make the app better. Subscription: â€¢ Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase â€¢ Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period â€¢ Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal â€¢ Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase â€¢ Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable - Privacy Policy: http://ptuwang.com/conf/privacy_notice_cutout.pdf - Terms of Use: http://ptuwang.com/conf/term_gen.pdf

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Planit Pro: Photo Planner
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$9.99 â†’ $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $9.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$4.99

In-App Purchases

  • 3D Model (A Year)ï¼š$5.99
  • 3D Model (A Month)ï¼š$0.99
  • Location Explorer (Month)ï¼š$4.99
  • Location Explorer (A Year)ï¼š$29.99

Application Description

Please email info@planitphoto.com for bug reports or feature requests. Please also remember to visit https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLTmlTTxPbBbcn1Fd1NRWTOczTY1RYEug4 for more video tutorials. Each video only lasts a few minutes but you will surely learn a lot from them. You can also reach us through Instagram. Links are under the menu inside the app. This is a special call to landscape photographers, travel photographers, nature photographers, and those who are interested in night photography, city photography, time-lapse, star-trails, milky way or astrophotography: look no more, this is the ultimate app for you - the Planit Pro. It only costs you a cup of Frappuccino but will save you tons of time and effort and a lot of gas money. Most importantly, it will make you enjoy landscape photography even more. Ansel Adams dedicates the beginning of his first book "Taos Pueblo" to visualization. He introduced the idea of "previsualization", which involved the photographer imagining what he wanted his final print to look like before he even took the photo. Of course, there are many great photos that were taken impromptu. However, for landscape photographers, being able to previsualize the scene before going there will greatly reduce the chance of being caught unprepared and will greatly increase the chance of getting better photos. Photographers use various tools to help them pre-visualizing the scene. Nowadays, many of those tools are phone apps. Planit Pro is an all-in-one solution that is designed to leverage the map and simulated viewfinder technologies to provide the necessary tools for photographers to pre-visualize the scene in combination with the ground subjects and the celestial objects such as the Sun, the Moon, Stars, Star-trails and Milky Way. In the Planit Pro app, we packed it with features - from location scouting such as GPS coordinates, elevations, distance, elevation gain, clear view, focal length, depth of field (DoF), hyperfocal distance, panorama, and aerial photography, to the Ephemeris features such as the sunrise, sunset, moonrise, moonset time and direction, twilight time, special hours of the day, sun/moon finder, major stars, constellations, nebulae azimuth and elevation angle, star trail planning, time-lapse calculation and simulation, sequence calculation and simulation, milky way searching, solar eclipse and lunar eclipse, exposure/ND filter calculator, light meter, rainbow position prediction, tide height, and tide search, etc. All the information is either represented on the map as an overlay or visually presented in simulated viewfinders (VR, AR, picture, or street view), just like you look through your camera's viewfinder. Whatever you want for your landscape photography, it is there in the Planit Pro. Landscape photography is an adventure in the natural world. We understand that sometimes there won't be any network connection when you are out exploring. Planit Pro was designed for having it in mind. If you preload the offline elevation files and the offline mbtiles maps, you can use the app fully offline without the need for network connections. License agreement at https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/ Privacy Policy at https://planitphoto.com/privacy.html

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

You can reach me directly on X for help or to report any issues: All4nDev, or through discord. Not affiliated with embark. Raiders Map is independently owned and managed. apple standard EULA https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

entry.title: MagicKit Pro: AI Smart Toolbox
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$3.99 â†’ Free [Free ~ $3.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

Application Description

MagicKit AI is a complete utility app designed to help you monitor your device, optimize performance, and access everyday tools from one convenient interface. Built specifically for iOS, MagicKit AI brings together essential features while maintaining your privacy and battery life. Device and System Tools â€¢ Battery Status: View current charge level and charging state â€¢ Storage Usage: Analyze available and used storage â€¢ Device Info: Check basic hardware and system details â€¢ Uptime Tracker: Monitor how long your device has been running â€¢ Battery Tips: Get practical advice to improve battery usage â€¢ Photo Cleaner: Detect and remove duplicate or similar photos to free up space â€¢ Contact Cleaner: Organize contacts by finding duplicates and incomplete entries â€¢ RAM Manager: Monitor memory usage and optimize performance â€¢ Device Benchmark: Test CPU, GPU, memory, and network performance Network Tools â€¢ Speed Test: Measure internet connection speed â€¢ Wi-Fi Info: See network name, IP address, and connection status â€¢ IP Lookup: Check geolocation of public IP addresses â€¢ Location Info: Track GPS location, speed, direction, and altitude Security & Privacy Tools â€¢ Password Generator: Create strong, secure passwords with customizable options â€¢ Passphrase Generator: Generate memorable and secure passphrases â€¢ UUID Generator: Create unique identifiers in various formats â€¢ Secure PIN Generator: Generate secure PIN codes with multiple options â€¢ Temporary Email: Create disposable email addresses for privacy protection Utility Tools â€¢ Unit Converter: Convert between different measurements â€¢ Currency & Crypto Converter: Get live exchange rates for fiat and cryptocurrencies â€¢ Date Time Calculator: Calculate differences between dates with business days support â€¢ Time Zone Converter: Convert time across various time zones with live updates and DST status â€¢ Countdown & Reminders: Create beautiful countdowns with customizable reminders and recurring events â€¢ Magic Counter: Track multiple counters with detailed statistics and streaks â€¢ QR Scanner: Scan QR codes instantly â€¢ Document & Card Scanner: Capture and save high-quality document scans with AI-powered text recognition â€¢ Compass and Level: Measure direction and level using device sensors â€¢ Orientation Lock: Lock screen orientation while using the app â€¢ Audio Meter: Measure surrounding sound levels using the microphone â€¢ Clipboard Manager: Access and manage copied text within the app session â€¢ Flashlight & Brightness: Turn on the device flashlight and adjust screen brightness â€¢ Note Taker: Create, organize, and manage notes with categories and iCloud backup â€¢ Universal Generator: Generate random data including text, numbers, dates, and more â€¢ Color Palettes Studio: Create, extract, and manage beautiful color palettes from images or manually using color pickers â€” perfect for designers and creatives Highlights â€¢ Clean and user-friendly interface with new wizard-based tools â€¢ Featured Tools section showcasing the most popular utilities â€¢ No ads or in-app purchases â€¢ Lightweight and battery-efficient â€¢ Compatible with all iOS devices â€¢ Frequent updates with new tools â€¢ Built with privacy and performance in mind â€¢ Dark/Light theme support with smooth animations Perfect for â€¢ Device monitoring and optimization â€¢ Everyday measurement and conversion tasks â€¢ Scanning documents and QR codes â€¢ Cleaning up photo storage and contacts â€¢ Creating and managing countdowns with reminders â€¢ Tracking habits and progress with multiple counters â€¢ Accessing quick tools like flashlight and brightness control â€¢ Performing simple network diagnostics â€¢ Generating secure passwords and managing privacy â€¢ Taking quick notes and organizing information â€¢ Designing and managing color palettes for creative projects Download MagicKit AI today and simplify your daily tasks with one smart, powerful toolkit.
